DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate pharmacokinetics aldesleukin patient metastatic renal cell cancer metastatic melanoma
DOC.brief_title: Aldesleukin Patients With Metastatic Renal Cell Carcinoma Metastatic Melanoma
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Performance Status Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group : 0 1 Adequate organ function Exclusion criterion : Pregnancy lactation Prior treatment aldesleukin Organ transplant Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
